sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './Complaints.css'; const Complaints = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('view'); // 'view' or 'file' const [viewFilter, setViewFilter] = useState('all'); // 'all' or 'yours' const [userComplaints, setUserComplaints] = useState([]); // User's filed complaints const [complaints] = useState([ { id: 'COMP2025001', title: 'Road Repair Required', title_en: 'Road Repair Required', category: 'Infrastructure', category_hi: 'Infrastructure', description: 'There are big potholes on the main road which pose accident risk.', status: 'In Progress', status_hi: 'In Progress', priority: 'High', date: '2025-09-15', submittedBy: 'Raj Kumar', department: 'PWD', lastUpdate: '2025-09-18', responses: [ { date: '2025-09-16', message: 'Your complaint has been registered. Investigation team is being sent.', from: 'PWD Office' }, { date: '2025-09-18', message: 'Site inspection completed. Work will start from September 25.', from: 'Site Engineer' } ] }, { id: 'COMP2025002', title: 'Water Supply Issue', title_en: 'Water Supply Issue', category: 'Water Supply', category_hi: 'Water Supply', description: 'Water supply has not been available for the past week.', status: 'Resolved', status_hi: 'Resolved', priority: 'Medium', date: '2025-09-10', submittedBy: 'Sunita Devi', department: 'Water Department', lastUpdate: '2025-09-19' }, { id: 'COMP2025003', title: 'Electricity Problem', title_en: 'Electricity Problem', category: 'Electricity', category_hi: 'Electricity', description: 'Electricity keeps cutting off frequently.', status: 'Pending', status_hi: 'Pending', priority: 'Medium', date: '2025-09-20', submittedBy: 'Mohan Lal', department: 'Electricity Board', lastUpdate: '2025-09-20' } ]); const [newComplaint, setNewComplaint] = useState({ title: '', title_en: '', category: '', description: '', priority: 'Medium' }); const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'Resolved': return 'var(--india-green)'; case 'In Progress': return 'var(--india-blue)'; case 'Pending': return 'var(--india-saffron)'; default: return 'var(--gray-dark)'; } }; const getPriorityColor = (priority) => { switch (priority) { case 'High': return '#FF4757'; case 'Medium': return 'var(--india-saffron)'; case 'Low': return 'var(--india-green)'; default: return 'var(--gray-dark)'; } }; const handleSubmitComplaint = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Here you would typically send the complaint to a backend alert('Complaint successfully registered. Your Reference ID: COMP2025004'); setNewComplaint({ title: '', title_en: '', category: '', description: '', priority: 'Medium' }); setActiveTab('view'); }; return (
{/* Header */}
‚öñÔ∏è

Complaint Management

Complaint Management

{complaints.length} Total
{/* Tab Navigation */}
{/* Content Area */}
{activeTab === 'view' ? (
{complaints.map((complaint, index) => (
#{complaint.id}
{complaint.status_hi}

{complaint.title}

{complaint.title_en}

Category: {complaint.category_hi}
Priority: {complaint.priority}
Department: {complaint.department}

{complaint.description}

{complaint.responses && (

Updates:

{complaint.responses.map((response, idx) => (
{response.from} {response.date}

{response.message}

))}
)}
By: {complaint.submittedBy} {complaint.date}
))}
) : (

File New Complaint

Please fill all required information

setNewComplaint({...newComplaint, title: e.target.value})} placeholder="e.g: Road Repair Required" required />
setNewComplaint({...newComplaint, title_en: e.target.value})} placeholder="Alternative title if needed" />
